The Variables
-------------

Measurement (predictor) variables

The outcome variable y has 6 values, corresponding to the six activities that subjects were performing, as follows:
1 WALKING
2 WALKING_UPSTAIRS
3 WALKING_DOWNSTAIRS
4 SITTING
5 STANDING
6 LAYING

```{r}
summary(cars)
```

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot(cars)
```
